mapper.select: SELECT /*[Token.xml][]selectTokenInfo*/ A.USR_NO as usrNo , A.TOKEN as token , A.USE_YN as useYn , A.CONF_STAT_CD as confStatCd , A.CONNECT_TP_CD as connectTpCd , A.SOLUTION_TP_CD as solutionTpCd , TO_CHAR(A.CRET_DTIME, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') as cretDtime , A.CRET_USR_NO as crtrMgmtNo , A.CRET_PGM_ID as cretPgmId , TO_CHAR(A.CHG_DTIME, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') as chgDtime , A.CHG_PGM_ID as chgPgmId , B.USR_ID as usrId , B.USR_NM as usrNm FROM MG_TOKEN_BASE A , MG_USR_BASE B WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.USR_NO = B.USR_NO AND A.TOKEN = #{token}

SELECT /* [Token.xml][selectTokenInfoByUsrId] */ USR_NO as usrNo , TOKEN as token , USE_YN as useYn , CONF_STAT_CD as confStatCd , TO_CHAR(CRET_DTIME, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') as cretDtime , CRET_USR_NO as crtrMgmtNo , CRET_PGM_ID as cretPgmId , TO_CHAR(CHG_DTIME, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') as chgDtime , CHG_USR_NO as pwuMgmtNo , CHG_PGM_ID as chgPgmId FROM MG_TOKEN_BASE WHERE 1 = 1 AND USR_NO = ( SELECT USR_NO FROM MG_USR_BASE WHERE 1 = 1 AND USR_ID = #{usrId} AND ROWNUM = 1 )
